summary.overview: This JCL performs file transfer operations to upload card demo test data from the mainframe to a remote server. It establishes an FTP connection to transfer a dataset to an external system for testing or data sharing purposes.
business_functions: Connect to remote server using FTP protocol
Navigate to target directory on remote server
Transfer card demo test data file to remote location

FTPJCL.JCL.program_overview: System utility for file transfer protocol operations

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo FTP Test File (AWS.M2.CARDEMO.FTP.TEST)
datasource_summary.function: Test file used for FTP transfer operations in the card demo system. The file is transferred from the mainframe to a remote FTP server as 'welcome.txt' for testing FTP connectivity and file transfer capabilities.

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    FTP["System utility for file transfer protocol operations (FTP) "]
